Title: Underground.
Subtitle: The Tokyo Gas Attack and the Japanese Psyche.
Authors: Haruki Murakami.
Categories: Cults.
Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=i2104FzgbvIC&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&source=gbs_api.
Description: This account of the 1995 gas attack on the Tokyo subway system by a Japanese religious cult is told, based on hundreds of interviews with survivors, relatives of those who died, and the perpetrators..
